title: List of all Android picker  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android picker  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: TimePickerDialog
repoList.description: An Android time picker library.

repoList.description: [NO LONGER MAINTAINED] Android library for better Picker DialogFragments
